title: CONNERS : A conversationally Explainable Recommendation
description: CONNERS : A conversationally Explainable Recommendation system was a year long research I conducted on A new form of CRS(Conversational Recommendation Systems)that could explain its recommendation to the user. The System uses Word vectors to derives it explaination using the interests presented by the user. This Research project was award a top 50 placement during my final year.
